com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.common

Class NIProvPerfConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.common.NIProvPerfConfig

  • public class NIProvPerfConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides configuration option for the non-interactive provider performance application.
